'''Dr. Simpson''' is an [[Obstetrics and Gynecology|OB/GYN]] who followed the early stages of Meredith's pregnancy.

==History==
After a call to have their appointment confirmed, Dr. Simpson gave Meredith and Derek a first ultrasound of their baby and assured them that they were going to watch the pregnancy like a hawk, given their history of fertility issues.

==Career==
Dr. Simpson is an [[Obstetrics and Gynecology|OB/GYN]] working at her own office.

==Notes and Trivia==
*Seeing Meredith's pregnancy counted as a high-risk pregnancy, Dr. Simpson may also be a [[Maternal-Fetal Medicine|perinatologist]].
*Dr. Simpson is one of the few doctors in the series not to work at a hospital.
